name: Arberry
text: By the rangers ranging

name: Arberry
text: and the scarers scaring

name: Arberry
text: and the reciters of a Remembrance,

name: Arberry
text: surely your God is One,

name: Arberry
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and of what between them is Lord of the Easts.

name: Arberry
text: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars

name: Arberry
text: and to preserve against every rebel Satan;

name: Arberry
text: they listen not to the High Council, for they are pelted from every side,

name: Arberry
text: rejected, and theirs is an everlasting chastisement,

name: Arberry
text: except such as snatches a fragment, and he is pursued by a piercing flame.

name: Arberry
text: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Are they stronger in constitution, or those We created? We created them of clinging clay.

name: Arberry
text: Nay, thou marvellest; and they scoff

name: Arberry
text: and, when reminded, do not remember

name: Arberry
text: and, when they see a sign, would scoff;

name: Arberry
text: and they say, 'This is nothing but manifest sorcery.

name: Arberry
text: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be raised up?

name: Arberry
text: What, and our fathers, the ancients?'

name: Arberry
text: Say: 'Yes, and in all lowliness.'

name: Arberry
text: For it is only a single scaring, then behold, they are watching

name: Arberry
text: and they say, 'Woe, alas for us! This is the Day of Doom.'

name: Arberry
text: 'This is the Day of Decision, even that you cried lies to.

name: Arberry
text: Muster those who did evil, their wives, and that they were serving,

name: Arberry
text: apart from God, and guide them unto the path of Hell!

name: Arberry
text: And halt them, to be questioned:

name: Arberry
text: "Why help you not one another?"

name: Arberry
text: No indeed; but today they resign themselves in submission

name: Arberry
text: and advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

name: Arberry
text: These say, 'Why, you of old would come to us from the right hand.'

name: Arberry
text: Those say, 'No; on the contrary, you were not believers;

name: Arberry
text: we had no authority over you; no, you were an insolent people.

name: Arberry
text: So our Lord's Word is realised against us; we are tasting it.

name: Arberry
text: Therefore we perverted you, and we ourselves were perverts.'

name: Arberry
text: So all of them on that day are sharers in the chastisement.

name: Arberry
text: Even so We do with the sinners;

name: Arberry
text: for when it was said to them, 'There is no god but God,' they were ever waxing proud,

name: Arberry
text: saying, 'What, shall we forsake our gods for a poet possessed?'

name: Arberry
text: 'No indeed; but he brought the truth, and confirmed the Envoys.

name: Arberry
text: Now certainly you shall be tasting the painful chastisement,

name: Arberry
text: and not be recompensed, except according to what you were doing.'

name: Arberry
text: Except for God's sincere servants;

name: Arberry
text: for them awaits a known provision,

name: Arberry
text: fruits -- and they high-honoured

name: Arberry
text: in the Gardens of Bliss

name: Arberry
text: upon couches, set face to face,

name: Arberry
text: a cup from a spring being passed round to them,

name: Arberry
text: white, a delight to the drinkers,

name: Arberry
text: wherein no sickness is, neither intoxication;

name: Arberry
text: and with them wide-eyed maidens restraining their glances

name: Arberry
text: as if they were hidden pearls.

name: Arberry
text: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

name: Arberry
text: One of them says, 'I had a comrade

name: Arberry
text: who would say, "Are you a confirmer?

name: Arberry
text: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be requited?"

name: Arberry
text: He says, 'Are you looking down?'

name: Arberry
text: Then he looks, and sees him in the midst of Hell.

name: Arberry
text: He says, 'By God, wellnigh thou didst destroy me;

name: Arberry
text: But for my Lord's blessing, I were one of the arraigned.

name: Arberry
text: What, do we then not die

name: Arberry
text: except for our first death, and are we not chastised?

name: Arberry
text: This is indeed the mighty triumph,

name: Arberry
text: for the like of this let the workers work.'

name: Arberry
text: Is that better as a hospitality, or the Tree of Ez-Zakkoum?

name: Arberry
text: We have appointed it as a trial for the evildoers.

name: Arberry
text: It is a tree that comes forth in the root of Hell;

name: Arberry
text: its spathes are as the heads of Satans,

name: Arberry
text: and they eat of it, and of it fill their bellies,

name: Arberry
text: then on top of it they have a brew of boiling water,

name: Arberry
text: then their return is unto Hell.

name: Arberry
text: They found their fathers erring,

name: Arberry
text: and they run in their footsteps.

name: Arberry
text: Before them erred most of the ancients,

name: Arberry
text: and We sent among them warners;

name: Arberry
text: and behold, how was the end of them that were warned,

name: Arberry
text: except for God's sincere servants.

name: Arberry
text: Noah called to Us; and how excellent were the Answerers!

name: Arberry
text: And We delivered him and his people from the great distress,

name: Arberry
text: and We made his seed the survivors,

name: Arberry
text: and left for him among the later folk

name: Arberry
text: 'Peace be upon Noah among all beings!'

name: Arberry
text: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

name: Arberry
text: he was among Our believing servants.

name: Arberry
text: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.

name: Arberry
text: Of his party was also Abraham;

name: Arberry
text: when he came unto his Lord with a pure heart,

name: Arberry
text: when he said to his father and his folk, 'What do you serve?

name: Arberry
text: Is it a calumny, gods apart from God, that you desire?

name: Arberry
text: What think you then of the Lord of all Being?'

name: Arberry
text: And he cast a glance at the stars,

name: Arberry
text: and he said, 'Surely I am sick.'

name: Arberry
text: But they went away from him, turning their backs.

name: Arberry
text: Then he turned to their gods, and said, 'What do you eat?

name: Arberry
text: What ails you, that you speak not?'

name: Arberry
text: And he turned upon them smiting them with his right hand.

name: Arberry
text: Then came the others to him hastening.

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'Do you serve what you hew,

name: Arberry
text: and God created you and what you make?'

name: Arberry
text: They said, 'Build him a building, and cast him into the furnace!'

name: Arberry
text: They desired to outwit him; so We made them the lower ones.

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.

name: Arberry
text: My Lord, give me one of the righteous.'

name: Arberry
text: Then We gave him the good tidings of a prudent boy;

name: Arberry
text: and when he had reached the age of running with him, he said, 'My son, I see in a dream that I shall sacrifice thee; consider, what thinkest thou?' He said, 'My father, do as thou art bidden; thou shalt find me, God willing, one of the steadfast.'

name: Arberry
text: When they had surrendered, and he flung him upon his brow,

name: Arberry
text: We called unto him, 'Abraham,

name: Arberry
text: thou hast confirmed the vision; even so We recompense the good-doers.

name: Arberry
text: This is indeed the manifest trial.'

name: Arberry
text: And We ransomed him with a mighty sacrifice,

name: Arberry
text: and left for him among the later folk

name: Arberry
text: 'Peace be upon Abraham!'

name: Arberry
text: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

name: Arberry
text: he was among Our believing servants.

name: Arberry
text: Then We gave him the good tidings of Isaac, a Prophet, one of the righteous.

name: Arberry
text: And We blessed him, and Isaac; and of their seed some are good-doers, and some manifest self-wrongers.

name: Arberry
text: We also favoured Moses and Aaron,

name: Arberry
text: and We delivered them and their people from the great distress.

name: Arberry
text: And We helped them, so that they were the victors;

name: Arberry
text: and We gave them the Manifesting Book,

name: Arberry
text: and guided them in the straight path,

name: Arberry
text: and left for them among the later folk

name: Arberry
text: 'Peace be upon Moses and, Aaron!'

name: Arberry
text: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

name: Arberry
text: they were among Our believing servants.

name: Arberry
text: Elias too was one of the Envoys;

name: Arberry
text: when he said to his people, 'Will you not be godfearing?

name: Arberry
text: Do you call on Baal, and abandon the Best of creators?

name: Arberry
text: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients?'

name: Arberry
text: But they cried him lies; so they will be among the arraigned,

name: Arberry
text: except for God's sincere servants;

name: Arberry
text: and We left for him among the later folk

name: Arberry
text: 'Peace be upon Elias!'

name: Arberry
text: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

name: Arberry
text: he was among Our believing servants.

name: Arberry
text: Lot too was one of the Envoys;

name: Arberry
text: when We delivered him and his people all together,

name: Arberry
text: save an old woman among those that tarried;

name: Arberry
text: then We destroyed the others,

name: Arberry
text: and you pass by them in the morning

name: Arberry
text: and in the night; will you not understand?

name: Arberry
text: Jonah too was one of the Envoys;

name: Arberry
text: when he ran away to the laden ship

name: Arberry
text: and cast lots, and was of the rebutted,

name: Arberry
text: then the whale swallowed him down, and he blameworthy.

name: Arberry
text: Now had he not been of those that glorify God,

name: Arberry
text: he would have tarried in its belly until the day they shall be raised;

name: Arberry
text: but We cast him upon the wilderness, and he was sick,

name: Arberry
text: and We caused to grow over him a tree of gourds.

name: Arberry
text: Then We sent him unto a hundred thousand, or more,

name: Arberry
text: and they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.

name: Arberry
text: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Has thy Lord daughters, and they sons?

name: Arberry
text: Or did We create the angels females, while they were witnesses?

name: Arberry
text: Is it not of their own calumny that they say,

name: Arberry
text: 'God has begotten?' They are truly liars.

name: Arberry
text: Has He chosen daughters above sons?

name: Arberry
text: What ails you then, how you judge?

name: Arberry
text: What, and will you not remember?

name: Arberry
text: Or have you a clear authority?

name: Arberry
text: Bring your Book, if you speak truly!

name: Arberry
text: They have set up a kinship between Him and the jinn; and the jinn know that they shall be arraigned.

name: Arberry
text: Glory be to God above that they describe,

name: Arberry
text: except for God's sincere servants.

name: Arberry
text: But as for you, and that you serve,

name: Arberry
text: you shall not tempt any against Him

name: Arberry
text: except him who shall roast in Hell.

name: Arberry
text: None of us is there, but has a known station;

name: Arberry
text: we are the rangers,

name: Arberry
text: we are they that give glory.

name: Arberry
text: What though they would say,

name: Arberry
text: 'If only we had had a Reminder from the ancients,

name: Arberry
text: then were we God's sincere servants.'

name: Arberry
text: But they disbelieved in it; soon they shall know!

name: Arberry
text: Already Our Word has preceded to Our servants, the Envoys;

name: Arberry
text: assuredly they shall be helped,

name: Arberry
text: and Our host -- they are the victors.

name: Arberry
text: So turn thou from them for a while,

name: Arberry
text: and see them; soon they shall see!

name: Arberry
text: What, do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?

name: Arberry
text: When it lights in their courtyard, how evil will be the morning of them that are warned!

name: Arberry
text: So turn thou from them for a while,

name: Arberry
text: and see; soon they shall see!

name: Arberry
text: Glory be to thy Lord, the Lord of Glory, above that they describe!

name: Arberry
text: And peace be upon the Envoys;

name: Arberry
text: and praise belongs to God, the Lord of all Being.
